decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (S1. Received: 27th November 2015 (save for the proposed ground floor plan which is superseded) 1 unnumbered plan. Received: 18th January 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the  walls of the outbuilding hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time as a self-contained residential unit and shall be used only for purposes incidental to the residential use of the dwelling known as 12 Kingston Avenue, Feltham, TW14 9SL.
description: Retrospective application for a single storey outbuilding in the rear garden for use as a gym, together with alterations to the roof height
